meanings.definition: The quality of being loyal or faithful.
meanings.sent1: Her loyalisms to her best friend never wavered.
meanings.sent2: The dog's loyalisms to its owner were heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: His loyalisms to his favorite sports team were so strong, he painted his room in their colors.
meanings.sent4: The soldier's loyalisms to his country were as unbreakable as steel.
meanings.sent5: The loyalisms of the old oak tree to the forest were evident in its steadfast growth.

meanings.definition: Beliefs or actions that demonstrate loyalty to a person, group, or cause.
meanings.sent1: The student's loyalisms to the school's values were commendable.
meanings.sent2: Her loyalisms to her family were evident in her daily actions.
meanings.sent3: His loyalisms to his favorite band led him to attend every concert.
meanings.sent4: The loyalisms of the dedicated volunteers shone brightly during the charity event.
meanings.sent5: The loyalisms of the firefighter to saving lives were unmatched.
